Function Documentation

void FilterUtilityFunctions::coordinateSystemCheck ( Entity *  pEntity,
SpaceID  spaceID,
EntityID  vehicleID 
)

This method updates an entity to ensure it is in the given coordinate system.

Parameters:
pEntity The entity to update
spaceID The server space the entity will now be in.
vehicleID The ID of the vehicle who's coordinate system the entity will now be in.

bool FilterUtilityFunctions::resolveOnGroundPosition ( Position3D &  position,
bool &  onGround 
)

This function decodes the 'on ground' condition by sampling the terrain height.

bool FilterUtilityFunctions::filterDropPoint ( ChunkSpace *  pSpace,
const Position3D &  startPosition,
Position3D &  land,
float  maxDrop = 100.f,
Vector3 *  groundNormal = NULL 
)

This function takes the input start position and drops it onto the collision scene.

A small upward fudge factor is applied to prevent the position falling through a collision poly it is resting on.

Parameters:
pSpace The space in which the position is defined.
startPosition The initial position to be dropped onto the collision scene.
land The position vector into which the final resting position of the point will be stored.
maxDrop The maximum distance to search for a place to land.
groundNormal (Optional Output) The surface normal of the geometry the drop point dropped onto. Untouched if no drop point was found.
Returns:
Returns true if a drop point was found.

void FilterUtilityFunctions::transformIntoCommon ( SpaceID  s,
EntityID  v,
Position3D &  pos,
Vector3 &  dir 
)

This function transforms the given position and direction into common/world space.

Parameters:
s The server space in which the give position and direction are defined.
v The vehicle who's coordinate system the given position and direction are defined.
pos The local space position to be translated into common space.
dir The local space direction to be translated into common space.

void FilterUtilityFunctions::transformFromCommon ( SpaceID  s,
EntityID  v,
Position3D &  pos,
Vector3 &  dir 
)

This function transforms the given position to its local representation.

Parameters:
s The server space into which the give position and direction will be placed.
v The vehicle in who's coordinate system the given position and direction will now exist.
pos The common space position to be translated into local space.
dir The common space direction to be translated into local space.
